original_text: It will be the same in the kingdom of God. Some people lift themselves up to be important. God will bring all of them down low. Other people are humble. God will lift up those people to a good place.’
korean_text: 무릇 자기를 높이는 자는 낮아지고 자기를 낮추는 자는 높아지리라

sentences.original_text: It will be the same in the kingdom of God.
Some people lift themselves up to be important.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 스스로를 높이여 중요하게 되려고 한다.

sentences.original_text: God will bring all of them down low.
God will lift up those people to a good place.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그 사람들을 좋은 곳으로 높이실 것이다.
